ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sylly means that we should have an ability to turn on a feature that won t let us drop items.  Just like the toggle for getting a prompt when destroying items
ygData.messageBody:
Sylly means that we should have an ability to turn on a feature that won't
let us drop items. Just like the toggle for getting a prompt when
destroying items but without the box. Just flip a switch and VOILA, you
can't throw litter on the ground anymore...

It wouldn't turn your equipment no-drop.

> At 08:55 AM 6/2/00 -0500, you wrote:
> >All items should be player controllable wrt dropping.
> >
> >My MM drums were a gift as were several other fine things. I have given
> >some nice gifts to folks as well.
> >
> >I would *hate* to see all things become no drops.
> >
> >Sylly
>
> sure, and then i'm on rallos zek, low on health after killing something.
ok turn
> all my items no drop so that if i get jumped by a pk they can't loot me.
too
> exploitable.
>
